Package io.github.waileong.fcm.service.domain

Class FcmApns

java.lang.Object
io.github.waileong.fcm.service.domain.FcmApns
public class FcmApns extends Object
Represents the Apple Push Notification service (APNs) configuration for an FCM message.

This class encapsulates the APNs-specific configuration data for a message, including HTTP headers, the payload, and APNs-specific options. The headers map allows for specifying HTTP header fields such as apns-priority, apns-expiration, etc. The payload contains the notification's content and behavior details, and fcmOptions allows for setting APNs-specific message options like analyticsLabel and image.

For more details on APNs configuration in FCM messages, refer to the Firebase documentation: APNs Config in FCM
